info.title: U-ED News API Documentation
info.description: A simple API made with Laravel 8

get.description: Returns list of article categories data

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by name of the article category

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Filter by the description of articles category

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status of article category 1 = Active, 0 = Inactive

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

parameters.name: header
parameters.description: Filter by header of the article

parameters.name: category_name
parameters.description: Filter by the name of article's category

parameters.name: creator_full_name
parameters.description: Filter by the full name of article's creator

parameters.name: tags_name
parameters.description: Filter by the name of article's tags

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status of article 1 = Active, 0 = Inactive

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status of article 1 = Active, 0 = Inactive

parameters.name: account_type
